DOC.brief_summary: We will examine the outcome of ventral hernia repair with subsequent pregnancy
DOC.brief_title: Pregnancy Subsequent to Ventral Hernia Repair
DOC.criteria: History of ventral hernia repair with subsequent pregnancy Born between January 1 1955 and January 1 1995 Registered in the Danish Hernia Database with a nonvalid IDnumber, i.e. nonDanish resident.
